Lomo Alto

Lomo Alto is located in the Eixample Derecho of Barcelona since 2016 and has already become the temple of the Iberian beef of Barcelona. This 700 square meters has been decorated by Lázaro Rosa Violán, playing inside a butcher shop.

Lomo Alto has the same philosophy that successful restaurants Barcelona El Nacional and Boca Grande, as they share owner.

The restaurant is run by Xavi Puigdengoles. In addition also it features Carlos Tejero in charge of the gastronomic direction. It is a place that tributes to quality meat and offers simple dishes extremely tasty and cared.

Location: Eixample

Dining room capacity: From 30 pax to 80 pax

Price level: Medium-high

Style: Meat specialized

Special diets: Available

Handicapped facilities: Yes
